case.state: Hi there! I’m Ping. This is where the game’s being played, right?
Hi. I'm... Ping! Let's uh... let's get down to business, shall we?
I’ve played a lot of cards when we were snowed in near the Tung Shao Pass. This’ll be easier than dumplings.
Nothing manlier than getting naked and gambling…
Huh… An anonymous girl… she seems… familiar.
Well, hello there hand-- ful of competition. Let's make this a good one, Mr...?
A spirit guide? Hm. I'm used to Mushu... but Navi seems like she'd be helpful here.
Hm. It seems odd to bring help to a game like this... can't you take care of yourself, Remilia?
Fire Emblem. Hm...
Hm... that's quite the outfit, Sheena. Befitting of xia, even.
You know, this seems like a pretty public place... but I guess it's easy to get street food...
I’d prefer mahjong…
Give me ~cards~, dealer.
Bah, ~cards~.
Wonderful. When I wasn’t marching or training, I played a lot of cards. Doesn’t seem to help too much now though…
Oh, this hand’s worse than three day old rice.
Oh noooo, this hand is awful. (I wonder if they realize I'm bluffing?)
You may as well give up now. This hand’s unstoppable.
See, everyone? Play with honor, and you might get a hand as good as mine.
Not bad. Pretty good, even.
Ugh, I should rip these cards in half, to show off how tough I am, or something equally obnoxious or distracting.
Can’t beat these cards.
You’re all about to get whupped. If you don’t take a risk now, it’ll cost you...
(Hm. I wonder if they can tell I'm bluffing?) Yep, this hand is incredible. Not at all bad.
Adventures? I suppose journeying across the Land of Dragons to save the Emperor from Shan Yu counts, huh?
Books... hm... I'm actually quite well-read! I like poetry, and philosophy, mostly, Aella.
Oh, D.Va? Are you sure you can keep up? I accept your challenge.
I like anything with singing! I know that's simple, but I far prefer it to instruments or poetry.
(Princess! Yeah, you! Don't tell if I don't!)
Have you heard of Green Destiny, Jin? Your blade reminds me of that tale.
Those panties are actually quite beautiful. Lacy... but not see through. You truly prefer the best goods you can find? I can only imagine how soft and gentle those must be...
A pleasure to meet you as well, little witch!
I see. I can carry a tune myself. I don't suppose you'd like to teach me your melodies, Lotte?
I'm sure you have, uh, many exciting stories to share with us, Lotte!
The Tung Shao pass, near the Great Wall, has a beautiful snowscape and numerous cozy villages, Meia. I'd start there.
Women from the Land of Dragons don't usually groom there. Some do elsewhere, but... what's wrong with what's natural?
Hm. I suppose you have a point. The Land of Dragons is... quite similar to Earth, though.
I guess you have a point... but I think taking something off your body is different than putting something on. Tell me, isn't it rougher on you without hair?
Your consort isn't of the Earth? How interesting! I wonder what other surprise you have for us, Crown Prince.
smirk Quite the story, Miko! Now, back to the game then, huh? I suppose I could tell you of my history, though...
A prince? Don't worry, Miko. I'll keep you safe tonight. No need to be a frightened little boy.
Oh? Do they serve food here, Pit? I'd like eggs and pork belly over rice. Um. Arranged like a smiley face.
A buff burly guy like only drinks the hard stuff! Like… the hardest liquor you have, Dealer!
Well, Sei, shall we say that a philosopher says that what one does in the army, one may come to enjoy? About what was gifted to all people, not just half?
Though, I'm sure I could make some fireworks fly if you and I got together after the game, Sheena.
How're you when it comes to ghost-fighting and repelling barbarian hordes, Syrenne? What about rescuing princesses?
Tsk. There are ladies present. Not me, and definitely not Syrenne, but be polite, won't you?
I know that look... you thinking what I'm thinking, Syrenne?
For a mercenary, you're making poor tactical decisions.
It's fine to be comfortable with whatever body you have. But I think... most people like to be private about their own.
I'm surprised to see a trainer here. I'm open to new lessons, Ms...?
I guess when you're particularly skilled, you become known only as the master of your art. Right, Trainer?
I've done lots of conditioning and martial arts, Ms. Trainer. Any extra tips or suggestions based on my physique?
Your bush is two-toned! How exotic!
Szechuan beef sounds great, heavy on the sauce, please.
It does seem odd to leave them just sitting there...
Huh? What do you mean there’s all girls here? I’m a spittin’ hack image of masculinity and bravado right here, ladies.
Pfft, I know it’s hard to believe that it’s four lovely ladies and a formidable soldier like me, but don’t get confused: I’m very much a boy. Man. Guy.
What's... Fapping? I think it's a joke at my expense. You know, Fa Ping.
Of course it's a man's name, Cammy. Because I am a manly, manly man.
I'll have you know I'm quite skilled, Kamina. We should spar!
Clearly, Misato is distracted by my manly charms, or she wouldn't be looking my way.
This is the ancestral armor of the Fa clan, Syrenne. I came equipped for a battle... though perhaps this would be more of a battle of wits!
Well... my wraps aren't as supportive as Ms. Trainer's bra, so they're at least a little more comfortable to get out of...
Spits. Calling me a woman because I lost one hand? Aren’t you a forward-minded bunch. Clearly, I’m a big strong man with my sword and my armor.
A Pegasus Knight? Uh, I can get my horse, Khan, to go pretty fast... but... I don't know what a Pegasus Knight is...
Kind of rude to assume I'm just based entirely on some logic structure, Kizuna.
What, because I don’t have facial hair, I’m a girl now? Well, I’ll show you what’s what next hand.
I know I lost the hand, but it’s rude to insult me by calling me a woman just because of it. I’ll have you know some of the best game players I know are women.
A Pegasus Knight? Uh, I can get my horse, Khan, to go pretty fast... but... I don't know what a Pegasus Knight is...
Kind of rude to assume I'm just based entirely on some logic structure, Kizuna.
I’ve got delicate features. So what? Never watched any wuxia plays? Doesn’t mean I’m a girl. And even if I was, I’d want you to treat me the same.
Huh? What’re you looking at, besides 130 pounds of pure testosterone?
A Pegasus Knight? Uh, I can get my horse, Khan, to go pretty fast... but... I don't know what a Pegasus Knight is...
Kind of rude to assume I'm just based entirely on some logic structure, Kizuna.
I’ve got a soft spot for wrists. Once, I used my big, throbbing man-brain to climb a pole with them. So, keeping a hard guard on my wrists just makes sense.
Heh. You got me there, Catria. No Pegasi, but some yaoguai and dragons and ghosts.
Remember to be charming, Miss. Princesses have an image to keep!
That's an easy one, even a wrong idiot like you should be able to grasp it. Blood flows from one head to the other.
Of course, Kamina. Wouldn't want, uh, anyone to feel like I went easy on them.
I have a soft spot for wrists... they come in rather handy. A fetish...? No, but... I always learn a lot from someone's hands, L'Arachel.
I'm impressed. Even with your one eyeglass, you can't tell the difference between a man and a woman, Meia.
Dealer, should we give Meia her eyeglass back? She seems to have a hard time telling the difference between a man and a woman.
Of course they are, Nayru. Why are you stammering?
You might want to get that vision checked, Sheena. I'm clearly a man.
Poise, dignity, and skill-at-arms are rather timeless. But so do mercenaries drinking in bars.
Nice. Very nice.
Just like taking off armor after a long day of training.
Can’t win if you aren’t willing to lose, ~name~! No need to get whiny about it.
Nice. Very nice.
Just like taking off armor after a long day of training.
Can’t win if you aren’t willing to lose, ~name~! No need to get whiny about it.
I feel like Overwatch is the Disney of shooters. Your Tracer would make quite the Disney Princess, I think!
An explorer? Must be nice to go where you please, do as you’d like…
Hmm… ~name~, if it’s not obvious yet, I find you pretty relatable.
So, ~name~, I’ve noticed you try and look very… neutral. I think it’s important to ask why, just to give you a chance to explain, if you’d like.
I don’t think I’ve seen that craft of armor before! I’ve always been fascinated by such things. It looks really tailored to you, too.
I'm a bit jealous, ~name~. It must be nice to have armor tailor-made like yours.
What’s the story of your blade, ~name~? Mine is a family relic, handed down through ancient times… Though I did win Shan Yu’s sword after the battle at the Palace…
I see you have a sword! I have one too. Obviously. They're very tough and manly.
Oh, what kind of story are you from, ~name~? I’m from a story, but I think mine’s been adapted and changed over the years…
A bounty hunter? Like a mercenary? While some policies in the Land of Dragons might be a bit… backwards, I generally trust the magistrates.
What a lawless place you must be from, bounty hunter. I suppose you're some sort of wanderer too, huh?
I think cartoons can have important messages, right, ~name~?
Such vivid hair! Is it common where you're from?
That’s such a small cannon you have… I bet it doesn’t even cause big explosions.
Your alchemists must be clever, arming you with such a small cannon.
A cannon can be useful, but I’ll always prefer the steel of a sword or the meat of my fists. That uh, sounds suitably masculine, right?
I’m no stranger to magic… well, I’m not very familiar with it… but I’ll always prefer bone and steel to sorcery.
So you… pilot mecha? Who doesn’t want to be part of something bigger than themselves, right, ~name~?
I actually do know a bit about mecha stuff. Engineering is fascinating.
It’s easy to tell when someone else has the bearing of a soldier.
What sort of battles have you fought in, ~name~? It’s easy to tell when someone’s disciplined.
~Name~’s a bit unnatural… but the only monsters I’ve ever met are human. I’ll give you a chance to prove yourself, ~name~. You deserve that much.
I see video games have caught up to the catchy tunes of Disney movies.
Hm… I see your world keeps an open mind about their heroes. And their weaponry. Shall we spar?
There’s something very unusual about you, ~name~... You don’t happen to be some sort of spirit? If so, have you met Mushu, one of the many Fa spirit guides?
I’ve never actually run into a witch, but they’re pretty spooky. You seem spookily pretty, though.
I don't think anyone's actually considered Streaming-chan might be good in bed…
He’s so delicate…
Your armor fits like a glove.
Are you a soldier of some sort, Jin?
You are... certainly forward with your intentions.
For someone that's clairvoyant, you're quite bad at predicting losses, Jin.
Well, hello there, handsome.
I'm still interested in how you took off your clothes last turn, Jotaro.
First blood, Kamina. I thought you'd put up more of a fight than this.
But I won the hand-- Oh, you're speaking about yourself.
My friend Megaera says that her culture values honor and strength.
Your chest is impressive, but you should work on your legs...
I was expecting more of a fight from you, Kamina, I'm still...
I'll admit, I love a rousing speech.
There's a great deal of stories about bandits who rise to become heroes.
You're not from around here, are you, Pit?
Your attire is quite unusual, Ryuji, if you don't mind me saying.
I'm... a little hungry. Is there a good noodle shop nearby?
What's your workout routine like? I can always learn from the best, and you seem quite prepared...
Oh yeah, this is what we came here for, right, boys?
You shouldn’t act so surprised, ~name~. Shang didn’t just teach us martial arts. We learn a lot of strategy in the Army too.
Someone’s hiding something. Probably ~name~ and her embarrassment. Don’t be such a crybaby, am I right, guys?
There’s no shame in accepting loss with dignity, ~name~. The more fragile you look, the easier it is for other people to dishonor you.
Wow, ~name~ looks beauti-- hot, right? Like a raging fire. Uh, unless she’s going for something dainty, like a flickering lantern. Yeah, yeah!
Oh yeah, this is what we came here for, right, boys?
You shouldn’t act so surprised, ~name~. Shang didn’t just teach us martial arts. We learn a lot of strategy in the Army too.
Someone’s hiding something. Probably ~name~ and her embarrassment. Don’t be such a crybaby, am I right, guys?
There’s no shame in accepting loss with dignity, ~name~. The more fragile you look, the easier it is for other people to dishonor you.
Wow, ~name~ looks beauti-- hot, right? Like a raging fire. Uh, unless she’s going for something dainty, like a flickering lantern. Yeah, yeah!
I feel like Overwatch is the Disney of shooters. Your Tracer would make quite the Disney Princess, I think!
An explorer? Must be nice to go where you please, do as you’d like…
Hmm… ~name~, if it’s not obvious yet, I find you pretty relatable.
So, ~name~, I’ve noticed you try and look very… neutral. I think it’s important to ask why, just to give you a chance to explain, if you’d like.
I don’t think I’ve seen that craft of armor before! I’ve always been fascinated by such things. It looks really tailored to you, too.
Womanly armor. Who’d make such things?
What’s the story of your blade, ~name~? Mine is a family relic, handed down through ancient times… Though I did win Shan Yu’s sword after the battle at the Palace…
I see you have a sword! I have one too. Obviously. They're very tough and manly.
Oh, what kind of story are you from, ~name~? I’m from a story, but I think mine’s been adapted and changed over the years…
A bounty hunter? Like a mercenary? While some policies in the Land of Dragons might be a bit… backwards, I generally trust the magistrates.
What a lawless place you must be from, bounty hunter. I suppose you're some sort of wanderer too, huh?
I think cartoons can have important messages, right, ~name~?
Such vivid hair! Is it common where you're from?
That’s such a small cannon you have… I bet it doesn’t even cause big explosions.
Your alchemists must be clever, arming you with such a small cannon.
A cannon can be useful, but I’ll always prefer the steel of a sword or the meat of my fists. That uh, sounds suitably masculine, right?
I’m no stranger to magic… well, I’m not very familiar with it… but I’ll always prefer bone and steel to sorcery.
So you… pilot mecha? Who doesn’t want to be part of something bigger than themselves, right, ~name~?
I actually do know a bit about mecha stuff. Engineering is fascinating.
It’s easy to tell when someone else has the bearing of a soldier.
What sort of battles have you fought in, ~name~? It’s easy to tell when someone’s disciplined.
~Name~’s a bit unnatural… but the only monsters I’ve ever met are human. I’ll give you a chance to prove yourself, ~name~. You deserve that much.
I see video games have caught up to the catchy tunes of Disney movies.
A Princess? I don’t suppose you know Ariel, Aurora, or uh, any of the Disney Princesses not named Mulan, do you?
Hm… I see your world keeps an open mind about their heroes. And their weaponry. Shall we spar?
There’s something very unusual about you, ~name~... You don’t happen to be some sort of spirit? If so, have you met Mushu, one of the many Fa spirit guides?
So, ~name~, you seem to have a great many misconceptions about men. Trust me, they’re not as bad as you’d think--I say, as one of them.
Men don’t have acidic sweat. They can even smell kind of nice after a long day’s work.
A lot of men are happy to pursue women they can be equal partners with. Sometimes you play offense, they play defense. If you’re into that kind of thing.
I’ve never actually run into a witch, but they’re pretty spooky. You seem spookily pretty, though.
I’ve heard stories of giants, but I’ve never gotten to meet one.
I have to say, Aella, there’s something about a big strong woman that’s exciting to a lot of guys. Like me. Obviously. Men like me.
I’m very impressed, Aella!
Aella, I know it’s tough trying to fit into a world where you’re a little different.
Duck and cover!
She’s doing it again?!
Everyone, defensive formations!
Get under the bar, or the table, or whatever we’re doing here!
Since the focus is on Akko, I suppose I could wave a small greeting to my friends…
You’re a princess, aren’t you, Amalia?
Respectable, but if you want to put up a real fight, you’ll have to double that.
Ano-- an-- a! Female soldier. How uh, novel.
So you fight to avenge your father, right?
I’ve… witnessed some awful defeats too. Burned villages…
Your country lets women fight…?
Huh. What kingdom are you from, Princess Elizabeth?
I can’t tell if you’re confident you won’t lose… Oh, right. For Futaba, this is about seeming sexy...
I think the idea of other worlds is so fascinating!
Miss... Haru, was it? I have a simple question... I have a theory. Have you been...
Your High-- Haruness. I apologize for my assumption.
H-Haru? Are you well? Do you want to stop...?
While doubtless we'd have much to talk about... your hair is...
Sometimes... the mark of any good leader is...
I was expecting something fun tonight. Not Ditz Poker Night.
Fools can be gentle, but not for a game like this!
W-what?
I can at least sympathize with pretending to be someone else... we all have our masks...
Oh, come now, Miss.
Some bluff, Princess ordinary girl.
I respect your forwardness, Juri.
It's sad your bravery is so cruel.
Those pants did look... quite tight. I'm surprised, given how free your leggings seemed.
A love spirit…?
Your armor's quite exotic! Are you a priest or a shaman...?
I think L'Arachel likes to go home after a long day of smiting to some smiting of her own, right, ~player~?
You really do learn more from failure than success. It's wonderful that you have that insight.
Lotte, you are a witch, aren't you?
Oh, so you are the type of witch that wears underwear, right?
So where are you from...? I can't say I've seen a woman like you before...
Well, you know what they say, a stranger is just a friend you haven't made yet.
Pardon me for the earlier strangeness, Mae... I... well, I have somewhat of a talent with... uh... animals and spirits and that like.
A… camera…?
I’m glad you noticed! I was hoping to acknowledge that we’re all--
And I thought I had problems. It does seem kind of terrifying to live in a world where people are an inch away from going berserk.
Isn’t it really obvious that you get better at the things you practice with?
Why, hello, beautiful.
Brr… I’ve spent a lot of time in the icy mountains…
Your armor is so fascinating, Meia. Do women from Mejare have such form-fitting attire?
Hm... Your armor doesn't leave much to the imagination, but I still wonder how you take it off...
You're terribly unfamiliar with men, aren't you, Meia?
A Taoist crown prince? If you are looking for soldiers to defend the Emperor, I would be honored to lend my sword to your cause.
A uniform?
Whether you’re a baker’s daughter, or a soldier…
I think you should be a bit more honest with your feelings…
I'm used to pyrotechnics, O Great Spirit. You're probably really tiny, right?
It's still a bit weird to get naked with a guide...
You're just like a little doll, Navi!
An evil spirit?!
...I’ve been meaning to ask, Nayru, are you human?
Palutena, you’re some sort of great spirit, aren’t you?
I’ll be honest, Palutena, I haven’t ever imagined a spirit naked before…
What kind of world are you from, Pinkie Pie?
H-how are you just floating like that? Are you a princess, or a witch?
Where did you get that belt?
Do you even have anything left besides your underwear? Are you even wearing...?
Did your maid-servant come to supervise you, Remilia?
You're certainly confident for someone who's lost.
Tch Ai-yah. Drunk little girl, go home.
I think I may have poked the hornet's nest.
It wouldn't surprise me if you treated Sakuya as a layer.
You look like you know a thing or two about being dishonorable, Revy.
The honorable thing to do would be to surrender, Revy.
A valued piece of advice, Revy…
I’ll stay my attack, Rinkah, but…
The Flame Tribe… and where is that located, relative to the Great Wall…?
It’s so nice to meet a woman as spirited as you, Rinkah!
Aren’t they both the same if one believes in one’s ancestors?
There’s a type of… vampire, sort of, called jiang-shi in my mythology.
Surely, you're wearing some sort of underwear?
A woman that’s a logistics officer?
(Oh... it's like one of those stories. I suppose Sayori and ~player~...)
Goodness, you're quite nervous. Couldn't you take off your shoes?
I'm not going to make it easy on you, Sayori, but I admire your spirit! Stay strong like that!
It is helpful to know about field medicine. I’m not sure what all you’re talking about…
I feel a tinge of spellcraft in the air-- Sheena, what are you--?
Lotta great wisdom in simplicity, Syrenne.
I have a feeling your glass won't be the next thing you give up.
Have you tried knocking them, for luck?
So, where'd you get those tattoos? And what are they for? Protection? Luck? Memories?
Watch out! Your drink!
I've heard of you, Tracer! I think you'd make quite the Disney Princess, if I do say so.
Purple skin… huh…
She is quite curvaceous.
Speaking of supportive bras, I could use my hands instead and--
You're dressed... very comfortably, Miss...?
I know you're a little sweaty, but that top looks very... supportive...
...Finally, a chance to make the joke. As supportive as your bra was...
Are you really a goddess?
You’re certainly very assured…
I’ll admit some degree of envy to a woman who is so unconcerned for herself. It must be nice not having to worry about how others perceive you.
W-well. I don't think many of the Princesses I know are this forward...
I wonder who I'd have to talk to to bring you into the Princesses...
Pfft. And here I was, expecting you to take off something decent.
Playing the long-game, ~name~, or just being a coward?
I suppose royalty are kind of built like… uh, fine china.
Must be nice to get a new set every generation.
I'm no stranger to conflict, either, especially from nearby borders.
...Very forward, if you mean what I think--
Wha-- what was that? So fast!
Think you can take me in a fight? I know all kinds of competitions, uh, big guy.
Not bad. I'd follow up, but...
Basically, what I'm saying is, since you lost before me, that means I'm manlier.
What's your home world like? Are all the soldiers like you?
A sash or a banner is a fine way of showing one's colors.
Who doesn't enjoy a bowl of hot soup, dumplings, and noodles? Especially with how cold this room is.
I... see.
I guess it’s still early.
Thought you’d be a bit more wild than that, ~name~. The whole dignified approach comes across as a bit cowardly. Not judging you, uh, man.
Really holding out on us, huh, tough guy?
He’s even pale and kind of translucent!
I had to inherit mine, even though my father’s got a… slightly different build.
I'm a little less... cavalier than you about it.
--oh. Not the sword I had been expecting, but a lovely blade.
You know, I hadn't really considered that...
So you can stop time... I can think of a few uses for that.
I'm not planning on losing.
...though I'd be impressed if you proved otherwise. What'd'ya say?
You certainly seem capable. I'm looking forward to further displays of bravery, here.
In my land, yellow is associated with rising spirits. I suppose with your wings, you're used to basking in the sunlight.
It's a challenge. Ryuji, if you win, I'll buy noodles. If you lose, you'll buy noodles. Either way, we don't have to leave this place on an empty stomach.
You're a little distracting, Ryuji. You remind me of an old captain. Have you ever been a captain?
Makes sense your ~clothing~ would be frilly. Womanly stuff like that usually is, right?
Your ~clothing~? Ha, how girly.
I suppose you could just do small stuff. You know, not like a girl like you would want to lose in a game like this.
~name~’s trying to stay modest by only taking off her ~clothing~. That’s… uh, is it fair, or is it prudish? I’m not quite sure the right way to answer…
Oh! She's a princess! This all makes a lot more sense. I've always been excited to meet new princesses!
I guess your people let women fight in the army too.
Just so you know, Aella, Shan means mountain.
Do you sing to animals, or…
Though, a word of advice, I'd hold onto my sword a bit longer...
I know a thing or two about that.
In uh, my experience, that’s a bit unusual.
I didn't know they had an American Princess besides Tiana!
Slowing down the game a bit seems reasonable. No reason to rush to the climax, right?
Perhaps poisoned...? Cursed...? Kidnapped? Held at ransom? Made a deal with a witch...? Daddy issues?
Her outfit is... quite interesting. I guess her wrists will be cute...
I promise, I'll stop the act, if we can get someone new in her place.
Well, I suppose there’s many types of affection.
Most witches I know tend to cause a lot of trouble for princesses...
Mae, is everyone from your world... do they all seem to be animals...?
I have uh, some Princess friends that are a bit more familiar with that sort of thing.
So strange, to think that you’re an alchemist, and an acclaimed one at that!
How you can stand to work in the cold everyday is a mystery to me, Mei.
Women from the Land of Dragons prefer flowing silks. Much easier to move in.
It must be nice to have someone help you undress.
She's right, Crown Prince. It's dishonorable to exploit the rules.
Headphones? Now you're pulling my leg, Crown Prince Miko.
Your dress is so short, though… are you preparing for war, Nagisa?
When you return to your realm, if you would kindly pass on a good word to my ancestors, this entire game will have been worth it.
I uh, want to know how to remove it from other women like you. Clearly.
Wait, how'd you do that? Sorcery!
A pirate, a smuggler, and a murderer for hire.
Though… it isn’t like I haven’t had to be flexible with the concept of honor in my life…
Are you a Hun? I’ve fought and triumphed over many barbarians just like you.
Ah, so sorry. I keep forgetting that I’m not in the Land of Dragons anymore.
You have a warrior's presence to you, Sayaka.
And a pilot…
Those look quite soft and silent. You... are a warrior, aren't you?
Though, if you were a boy this'd be quite the chance to tell you you were strapping..
You certainly don't dress like a mortal...
Are scarves popular in your deific realm, Zizou?
Not surprised you stuck with something small. Women are loaded up with tons of that kind of things. ~Clothing~. Cute and delicate ~clothing~.
So, let’s see what’s next, right? ~clothing~? Seriously. Who wears ~Clothing~ when you could show up in a full set of armor?
I guess a fair and chivalrous maiden like ~name~ would part with her ~clothing~ rather than expose herself to a rowdy crowd like this. Heh!
I was just checking out her ~clothing~... Uh, checking ~name~ out. Like a guys-guy would do.
If I were a woman, I’d try something like that. If I were. Which I’m not.
That’s something, I guess. Though I can’t ever imagine that being something we’d need in my Kingdom.
Just have to make sure to keep the men and women separate, right? Would be a real shame if that got mixed up.
Because, uh, you’re big and strong. And everyone probably wants to climb on top. Eheh. Quite the jokester, I am, and not the first time you’ve heard it, I’m sure.
I get it! You must talk to plants! That’s quite the talent.
I see! Did you come to look at spears tonight, Catria?
Love the hairstyle and qipao, Chun-Li. I feel like we’re gonna be good friends.
And to let you wear such a feminine outfit… That Overwatch place is doing something right.
Huh? You aren't a princess? You could've fooled me!
I-I'm not familiar with princesses at all! That's why I asked. I guess a princess wouldn't just lift her skirt like that, though...
I guess every princess should have something that's iconic and special.
I don't know about that, Elizabeth. I certainly understand!
There we go! I know a princess when I see one! Do you get the whole "singing about a dream," accompaniment, too? O-Oh. Y-you just have such a regal bearing...
You should learn to use your bracelets to propel you to new heights, Ini. I did that once.
Sigh. At least she's reasonably cute.
Let’s just say I’m sure both of us are familiar with various varieties and split the difference, hm, Kyu?

Y-you don't wear underwear. What a strange... choice.
I've won battles less attired... well, I do have hair... what an odd appearance.
How could I not look? Your hair is pink, even down there! You are heavenly, Sayori!
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
Impressive! I've used fireworks as a distraction a few times myself!
Well, you were already wet. And it does seem like you've tidied up...
Looks like someone had something to prove!
Well, if an expert does it, maybe I should shave...
Given how... prim. How prim you are, Zizou, I was expecting something less... of a full moon.
Judging by your... ah, overall appearance, you would certainly be good variety...
...Like, really good if her boasts are accurate.
Aurora, Elsa, Belle, if you’re watching this… you really should give it a try! People are pretty friendly to princesses…
In the Army, we drilled for four hours a day, with at least two hours marching, and two hours building and tearing down camp.
Sometimes a retreat is the right choice, Coco. There’s no shame in that.
I guess some people like surprises more than others.
The Land of Dragons is one such world, with visitors from many others, despite similar destinies.
--I was going to say attracted to men and women, but I suppose you have somewhat of a point…
Well… I guess having a hero like Ladybug around teaches people to be calm, or at least ask for help, huh?
I would be… misleading if I didn't find some romance in redemption.
Tch. I have heard that if you massage them, they’re less tense and generally larger…
Er, if not your way of approaching them, I think being… uh…
Hm… Witchcraft and magic is something that I thought was frowned on in all worlds.
I guess being a hopping vampire would kind of explain Sakura’s condition. You know, singing and dancing… desires of the flesh…
But knowing what herbs to apply, what ointments to use, how to set bones, and making sure a soldier’s spirit stays in good condition is invaluable.
I have quite a… uh, boyish figure. But when it comes to women, it’s nice to see them have some weight to them. (And I think Ochako’s more of a C…)
Well, maybe I'll take that risk if nobody else will...
And there’s so much variety! Something for all of you!
Hm… mindfulness meditation is useful. A warrior’s blade can only be as sharp as her mind.
If it’s any consolation... I liked your ~clothing~! Sorry, just, let’s get the mood back up. No need to dwell on what’s happened...
I’m never against seeing cute girls in the nude, though. Futaba seems a little fragile for my tastes, though.
It would be nice to meet some of the other Pings… or Mulans! Of other lands. I wonder how many I could beat in a fight or in strategy...
Well, no reason we can’t all enjoy ourselves, right?
We could all be a little more tranquil at heart, I think. But also on fire within. Philosophy is more complicated than people, I think.
Or young heroines seducing villains onto the honorable path with their supple-- virtues.
Of course she has hair. She isn’t a child!
I’m trying to say, it’s important to be honest with yourself, even if you have to lie to others, I suppose.
It’s good to know that some witches use their magic to help others.
It feels perverse to ponder on this topic.
...And making sure they’re not using battle rest as an excuse to set bones..

Not every style of martial art is the same, so I’m going to study you real closely, ~name~.
Let's see how a manly-man does it.
Oh… yeah. That’s good… I can… Uh, imagine myself doing a similar thing later.
You aren't going to stop time and make us miss it, are you?
I'll certainly be learning from the experience, after all.
You’re getting me hot under the armor, ~name~.
Men have needs. So, really, who hasn’t done this in a tent with their friends. Not me, but I don’t blame you, ~name~.
This game’s become… a little more open-minded than I’d anticipated it being…
I've heard of some women that can climax without touching themselves... but never a man. How are you doing that, Jotaro?
A man that can continue-- I mean, truly impressive, Kamina.
Well, that’s one man made.
Oh, that is a lovely surprise, to be honest. It’s such a mess… um… cleaning up, otherwise.
Oh! Was--was I the only one to see that? Something dragon-spirit-y? How lucky to have you here at this game, Corrin!
W-what was that? I'm not... a stranger to this, but... I've never seen it glow!

Were you so angry because you needed to climax...? Maybe I'll just be mad to show you how it feels...
I'd love to watch that again, Kamina. Later, perhaps...
I bet you clean up nicely, and are on time…
I have bested conquerors, impersonated someone who never existed, and been canonized as a Princess over many more deserving. But this? This is the strangest moment of my life by far.
What witchcraft is this?
Can you hold onto your wits as you hold onto yourself?
Uh, you know, during the one hand salute.
That sounds... rather unpleasant. Let's make a pact to avoid such things.
I think Rapunzel’s mentioned something similar, though I doubt she uses her hair for what… you are, Amalia.

I suppose if one had a wife here, this wouldn't be that strange.
Ai-yah! What's this!?

This is quite something!

I've never watched a spirit do this... quite compelling, noble or not.
I can see the fireworks in your eyes, ~name~!

Of course you can, Sheena! There's plenty of unicorns for princesses in the world. Or maybe try a Kirin?
She's... should we cut her off? I can't imaging what she'd do with... a few more rounds.
I think you've earned a drink or two, Syrenne. Cheers.
There’s a reason why I stepped forward to defend the family honor.
This’s much easier without all my armor. ~cards~.
Just ~cards~.
~cards~ for me.

Lucky cricket or no, this is a most fortunate hand.
Now this is fun. Don’t just make me wonder, show me what the rest of you got!

This'll do.
Oh, you're all in for it now!
Reflect before you act. This shall bring you glory and honor.
Want to arm wrestle instead? I’m a lot more confident in that than these. Come on, look at me, surely one of you big, strong folks can take me…?
Dishonor on this hand. Teehee. I know that’s more of a giggle than a deep chuckle, but I had to say it at least once!
Honor’s very important. So, I’ll go ahead and admit this hand’s pretty much slop.
Tsk. And here I was, thinking myself so clever. I can fold, right? This hand, I mean. Obviously, any civilized person can do their own laundry...
Well, at least I have nothing left to hide. Except my body. That I can hide.
Well, 9S? Aren't you programmed to help humans? What's your answer?
Adventures? I suppose journeying across the Land of Dragons to save the Emperor from Shan Yu counts, huh?

Well, Ann?

I like anything with singing! I know that's simple, but I far prefer it to instruments or poetry.
Well, I'm certainly very curious, Futaba.
Well, Spider-Woman? What do you have for us?

Hmm... I wonder, Kizuna.

A pleasure to meet you as well, little witch!
I see. I can carry a tune myself. I don't suppose you'd like to teach me your melodies, Lotte?

Well... my wraps aren't as supportive as Ms. Trainer's bra, so they're at least a little more comfortable to get out of...

Why thank you! I really liked your costume. I think I've seen sweaters with that pink/white design. I'm not really one for helmets, though.

Dang! I thought I was doing so well! At least I have quite a few layers left. Perks of elaborate styles, I suppose.
I’ll hold onto the sword for a while longer. I’m fine with my hands, but I think you get my point better when I’m visibly armed.
And here I was, worried you’d start taking it easy on me for being a woman. I appreciate the respect!
I’ll just kick these off…
...It’s normally pretty rude to wear shoes indoors. Don’t believe everything you hear about me, though.

I'll just kick these off. And yes, is that a shock, Kamina? I'm quite good at kicking!
I'll kick these off. After all, Kamina did it earlier. Suitably manly, even dressed like this...

I appreciate the compliment, but that armor is an heirloom. I think I actually look rather dashing in it.

Well, they do say an ugly wife is a treasure in the home...
Well, apparently, the princesses hold most of the value in that group, but… we probably don’t need to get into that.
Trust me, it’s confusing for me too, but I suppose nobility is in how one conducts themselves.
I prefer mid-sized and smaller ones. I’m not really any good at doing tricks like using two together, and the big, two-handed ones lack some of the nimbleness I like.

If anything, I’d guess it’s named after me and my legend.
Huh. Like… magical arms? I’ve heard some people with limbs of jade and stone and the like…

I will, Cammy, just give me a moment. It's nice to stretch out a bit.
I appreciate that it at least fooled Catria. Thanks for humoring me, my blue-haired Pegasus Knight.

Am a woma-- Kamina. I'm a woman. One that's somehow flattered the disguise worked that well on you.

Ah, no, Pit. You were very respectful. Don't change a thing. Except your clothes. Those have to go.

An explorer? Must be nice to go where you please, do as you’d like…
Hmm… ~name~, if it’s not obvious yet, I find you pretty relatable.
So, ~name~, I’ve noticed you try and look very… neutral. I think it’s important to ask why, just to give you a chance to explain, if you’d like.
I don’t think I’ve seen that craft of armor before! I’ve always been fascinated by such things. It looks really tailored to you, too.
I'm a bit jealous, ~name~. It must be nice to have armor tailor-made like yours.
What’s the story of your blade, ~name~? Mine is a family relic, handed down through ancient times… Though I did win Shan Yu’s sword after the battle at the Palace…
I see you have a sword! I have one too. Obviously. They're very tough and manly.
Oh, what kind of story are you from, ~name~? I’m from a story, but I think mine’s been adapted and changed over the years…
A bounty hunter? Like a mercenary? While some policies in the Land of Dragons might be a bit… backwards, I generally trust the magistrates.
What a lawless place you must be from, bounty hunter. I suppose you're some sort of wanderer too, huh?
I think cartoons can have important messages, right, ~name~?
I think we have a rich cultural heritage in common, ~name~! But I’m the Mulan from the Land of Dragons, not just China.
Stories have a way of taking on a life of their own… like this game being one of our adventures… Will this tale be one of China, or the Land of Dragons, ~name~?
Such vivid hair! Is it common where you're from?
That’s such a small cannon you have… I bet it doesn’t even cause big explosions.
Your alchemists must be clever, arming you with such a small cannon.
A cannon can be useful, but I’ll always prefer the steel of a sword or the meat of my fists. That uh, sounds suitably masculine, right?
I’m no stranger to magic… well, I’m not very familiar with it… but I’ll always prefer bone and steel to sorcery.
So you… pilot mecha? Who doesn’t want to be part of something bigger than themselves, right, ~name~?
I actually do know a bit about mecha stuff. Engineering is fascinating.
It’s easy to tell when someone else has the bearing of a soldier.
What sort of battles have you fought in, ~name~? It’s easy to tell when someone’s disciplined.
~Name~’s a bit unnatural… but the only monsters I’ve ever met are human. I’ll give you a chance to prove yourself, ~name~. You deserve that much.
I see video games have caught up to the catchy tunes of Disney movies.
Hm… I see your world keeps an open mind about their heroes. And their weaponry. Shall we spar?

I’ve never actually run into a witch, but they’re pretty spooky. You seem spookily pretty, though.
With all your magic sensors, you actually weren’t sure, were you?

PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
But I can see a chest that I wouldn't mind bringing home with me tonight.
...For a game that isn’t for children, it seems odd to censor a man’s nipples.
It’s impressive, in some ways. Refreshing to see such honesty, especially among nobles.
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
I wasn't checking you out. It doesn't make up for your play so far. No way.
Impressive, Jotaro. I'd like to see how you wrestle.
But since your shirt's off, can I see how your wings attach?
Impressive. How many of those can you do?
I… won’t look if you don’t like… Actually, you signed up for this. Strip!
It would be... a new challenge for me to appreciate. I think.
Oh my, how exotic. That… thong, is something a courtesan would wear… but a high class one.
Huh! I haven’t seen underwear like that before. It just shows off everything so well! I might have to invest in a pair of those before I head home.
I can think of several people, myself included who'd be disappointed with that.
No using your sorcery, this time?
Well, I guess I'm still plenty manly, at least.
It would be... a new challenge for me to appreciate. I enjoyed Coco's version, but I think I'd like yours even more, Kamina.
It'll be fine. You can do this.
Oh… ~name~. It’s bigger than mine, at least. Uh, sorry if that’s… embarrassing to you. It… has to be uncomfortable for a woman to be more man than you.

And to think, if you hadn't have spilled your drink, this would've been completely different.
...you think I could support your chest with my hands? It might be a great workout for my hands...
Revenge... magic?
Though, I suppose that could change! The rules, like me, can be flexible, honestly!

I think the stuff you work for ends up being the work that’s most impressive. But, you did already get me out of my armor… and my disguise.
Hmm… I suppose you’re expecting my sword by now… don’t worry, I’m not going to do any fancy tricks with it, but I’m still not really interested in parting with it just yet.

To be honest, I hardly notice at this point. I probably respond more readily to that than Mulan, really...

The battle at the Imperial City?

If anything, I’d guess it’s named after me and my legend.
Huh. Like… magical arms? I’ve heard some people with limbs of jade and stone and the like…
You did strike me as the type of... warrior to make use of whatever is on hand.

You are nothing if not excitable, Kamina. I admire that.
Perfectly, L'Arachel. I hope my response is obvious to you, as well.

The floor is so cold, like an early morning bath... Oh um. Yes, Pit, but they're quite rare, or too hot!

PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
But I can see a chest that I wouldn't mind bringing home with me tonight.
...For a game that isn’t for children, it seems odd to censor a man’s nipples.
It’s impressive, in some ways. Refreshing to see such honesty, especially among nobles.
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
I wasn't checking you out. It doesn't make up for your play so far. No way.
Impressive, Jotaro. I'd like to see how you wrestle.
But since your shirt's off, can I see how your wings attach?
Impressive. How many of those can you do?
I… won’t look if you don’t like… Actually, you signed up for this. Strip!

Oh my, how exotic. That… thong, is something a courtesan would wear… but a high class one.

Well, I guess I'm still plenty manly, at least.

PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
